verbs.description: [ARG0: rockets] [V: scorch] [ARG1: sharks] [ARGM-PRP: for preseason win] but zhou qi goes out with knee injury the rest of the rockets save the eight held out with injuries or for rest got a bit of a workout and a night of target practice along the way to the expected blowout of the sharks with the rockets leading by 51 on the way to a perfunctory 128 - 86 rout sharks band formed 2007 james ennis iii cba zhou national basketball association gary clark brandon sampson nba clint capela zhang zhaoxu james harden sharks zhou qi rockets band p j tucker shanghai asia p j tucker jimmer fredette luis scola rockets gerald green mike d'antoni yao ming
